location.text:
::U6 p61 5 Future forms::
Look at the examples and answer the questions.
- As soon as the film ends, we'll call a taxi.
- We'll have dinner when she arrives.

stem.text: Look at the examples and answer the questions. - As soon as the film ends, we'll call a taxi. - We'll have dinner when she arrives.

location.text: 1 What form of the verb follows a future time expression? 2 Is the clause with the time expression referring to the present or the future? 3 Is the time clause at the beginning or the end of the sentence? 4 What is the difference in meaning between as soon as and when?
